text: Ora pratyeke'i ki mathara upara sba sba krtakarma niye dandayamana naya? Ebam tara allahara jan'ya ansidara sabyasta kare. Baluna; nama bala athaba khabara da'o prthibira emana kichu jinisa samparke ya tini janena na? Athaba asara kathabarta balacha? Baram susobhita kara hayeche kapheradera jan'ye tadera prataranake ebam taderake satpatha theke badha dana kara hayeche. Allaha yake pathabhrasta karena, tara kona patha pradarsaka ne'i.
